entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016
